name: Capsule Sandbox
description:
This is some random prototype that I made when I was bored. Not really a game, you just place walls and then explode them.

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Look - mouse

Fire rocket - left click

Select rpg - Q

Select wall placer - E

How to use wall placer: first you left click anywhere to see the wall blueprint, then if you left click again you place it. You can also press R to rotate it 90 degrees before placing it.
